properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 9 at 3:39AM PST until February 10 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Los Angeles/Oxnard CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Areas of northeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to
55 mph expected. Local gusts to 60 mph are possible in the
hills.

* WHERE...Santa Clarita Valley, especially below passes and
canyons.

* WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to noon PST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and
make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may
result.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Roadway affected by strong cross winds
include Interstate 5 and Highways 14 and 126.
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO NOON PST MONDAY
